title: Reveal screen enhancements: Bengali shayari, teddy animation, and rose burst on entry

requirements.summary: Add a dedicated Bengali love shayari section under the existing reveal headline with matching dreamy/glassmorphic styling and responsive typography.
acceptanceCriteria: On the reveal screen, a clearly readable shayari block appears below the main headline.
The shayari block uses Bengali script text (Bangla) and is visually consistent with the current romantic/glassmorphic styling (soft shadows, no harsh contrast).
The shayari text is responsive (does not overflow on small screens) and remains legible over the background and animations.

file_operations.description: Create a small presentational component that renders the Bengali (Bangla) shayari text with soft/glassmorphic-friendly typography (responsive font sizes, relaxed line-height, safe wrapping). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new Bengali shayari block directly under the existing "You are my Valentine ❤️" headline within the main glassmorphic card, ensuring spacing and text contrast remain consistent with the current dreamy Valentine aesthetic. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a gentle, responsive teddy animation element to the reveal screen without obstructing headline/shayari readability or interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: A teddy visual/animation is visible on the reveal screen.
The teddy animation is gentle (e.g., sway/bounce) and does not distract from or cover the main text.
The teddy element is responsive and looks good on mobile and desktop.

file_operations.description: Create a reveal-only teddy visual component using the existing asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/teddy-bear-transparent.dim_128x128.png with a gentle animation and responsive sizing/positioning; ensure it does not capture pointer events. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add/extend a gentle teddy motion animation (e.g., subtle sway) utility class to be used by the reveal teddy so it feels calm and non-distracting, matching the existing romantic animation style.

Place the reveal teddy element harmoniously around the existing reveal content (e.g., anchored near a corner or alongside the card on larger screens) so it never overlaps the main text block; keep layering and pointer-events safe. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Make the rose/petal animation on reveal have an initial celebratory burst on screen entry, then settle into the existing gentle continuous falling behavior with safe cleanup.
acceptanceCriteria: When transitioning into the reveal screen, the rose/petal animation feels like it starts/celebrates the reveal (e.g., brief increased spawn density for the first seconds), then returns to the existing continuous gentle falling behavior.
The petal animation layer still does not block interactions (pointer-events disabled).
No performance issues or runaway intervals/animation frames occur after repeated page refreshes.

file_operations.description: Adjust the animation logic to include a clear on-mount burst (e.g., immediate initial spawn plus a short high-density spawn window), then revert to the current gentle spawn rate; ensure all timers/animation frames are correctly cleaned up to prevent leaks on repeated transitions/refreshes.
Confirm the rose/petal animation remains correctly layered for the reveal (celebratory burst visible behind the content) while preserving pointer-events disabled so interactions are never blocked.
